scripts.decode-macros: npm run build && npm run permission && ./build/cli.js convert-proto-to-json ./binaries/Macros
scripts.encode-macros: npm run build && npm run permission && ./build/cli.js convert-json-to-proto ./binaries/Macros.json
scripts.sync-macros: npm run build && npm run permission && ./build/cli.js sync-midi-macros ./binaries/Macros
